name: Acoustic Guitar
description: A beautiful dreadnought acoustic guitar with a rich, warm tone. Perfect for beginners and seasoned players alike.

name: Electric Keyboard
description: 61-key portable electronic keyboard with built-in speakers and hundreds of sounds. Includes stand and power adapter.

name: Professional Microphone
description: Studio-quality condenser microphone ideal for recording vocals, podcasts, and instruments. Crystal clear audio capture.

name: Vinyl Record Player
description: Classic belt-drive turntable with a vintage look and modern features, including Bluetooth connectivity.

name: Drum Pad Machine
description: Compact and portable drum machine with 16 velocity-sensitive pads. Perfect for creating beats on the go.

name: Studio Headphones
description: Over-ear, closed-back headphones designed for monitoring and critical listening. Excellent noise isolation.

name: Ukulele Starter Kit
description: Fun and easy-to-play soprano ukulele. Comes with a gig bag, tuner, and extra strings. Great for all ages.
